a:CheckGlobalScript:
'****************************************************************************** '* Purpose: This VB-Script holds global definitions shared by all the custom- '* checks scripts of the model extension. '******************************************************************************
Option Explicit ' This is to ensure all used variables are defined
Const cMDDE_PRJ_EXT_CODE = "MDDE_PRJ" Const cMDDE_LDM_EXT_CODE = "MDDE_LDM"
'****************************************************************************** ' Routine to write an error to the output. '****************************************************************************** Sub WriteError (strMsg) Output now() & vbtab & " ERROR: " & strMsg End Sub
'****************************************************************************** ' Routine to write an debug message to the output. '****************************************************************************** Sub WriteInfo (strMsg) Output now() & vbtab & " INFO: " & strMsg End Sub
'****************************************************************************** ' Routine to write an debug message to the output. ' To enable or disable debug mode: ' > In Tools -> General Options -> Variables ' > Create an environment variable named MDDE_DEBUG_MODE with the value True or False. '****************************************************************************** Sub WriteDebug (strMsg) 'Initialize the debug mode to be disabled. Dim bDebugMode : bDebugMode = False
' Check whether debug mode is configured. If Not(ActiveModel Is Nothing) Then ' If the MDDE_DEBUG_MODE variable is configured, use it. If Len(ActiveModel.EvaluateText("%$MDDE_DEBUG_MODE%")) > 0 Then bDebugMode = CBool(ActiveModel.EvaluateText("%$MDDE_DEBUG_MODE%")) End If End If
' Write the output if debug mode is enabled. If (bDebugMode) Then Output now() & vbtab & " DEBUG: " & strMsg End If End Sub
